prompts: Create a majestic dragon-like Pokemon with shimmering blue scales and metallic accents.
I want a powerful legendary Pokemon that embodies time and has a futuristic design.
Generate a Pokemon with a sleek body and intricate patterns, showcasing both elegance and strength.
Make a Pokemon that stands tall with a crystalline structure, representing the essence of time itself.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines elements of steel and dragon types, with a striking appearance.
Design a Pokemon that emits an aura of authority and power, with features that suggest control over time.
Give me a legendary Pokemon known for its rarity and time-manipulating abilities, with a unique color palette.
